Classes/Base64.html.name: Base64
Classes/Base64.html.abstract: The Base64 class exists to provide a namespace, there is no Base64 instances. It contains static functions for Base64 encoding and decoding.

Classes/Ed.html.abstract: The Ed class exists to provide a namespace, there is no Ed instances.
